name: Vegan Pumpkin Cake with Chocolate Pumpkin Ganache
description: Vegan Pumpkin Cake with creamy Chocolate Pumpkin Ganache. Easy 1 Bowl Pumpkin Sheet Cake with a thick chocolate frosting. Vegan Soyfree Recipe. Can be nut-free. Glutenfree option
recipeIngredient: 3/4 cup pumpkin puree (, not pumpkin pie mix)
1/4 cup coconut milk (, or use almond milk)
2 tbsp oil (, optional or use more non dairy milk)
2 tsp pumpkin pie spice (, add 1/2 tsp cinnamon for additional spice)
2 to 3 tbsp sugar for sweeter ((coconut, cane or brown))
1.25 cups flour ((I use a mix of all purpose and whole wheat))
3 tbsp almond flour (, or use more flour for nutfree)

recipeInstructions.text: Line a brownie pan or 8 or 9 inch cake pan with parchment. Preheat the oven to 350 deg F (180 C).
recipeInstructions.name: Line a brownie pan or 8 or 9 inch cake pan with parchment. Preheat the oven to 350 deg F (180 C).

recipeInstructions.text: Mix all the wet ingredients in a bowl until well combined.
recipeInstructions.name: Mix all the wet ingredients in a bowl until well combined.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the dry ingredients and mix until just about combined. The batter will be thick. Spread evenly in the prepared pan.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the dry ingredients and mix until just about combined. The batter will be thick. Spread evenly in the prepared pan.

recipeInstructions.text: Bake for 30 mins. 5 mins less or more depending on the pan used. Taller cake will need longer time. Check with a toothpick inserted in the middle. It should come out clean. For muffins or cupcakes, bake for 20 to 22 mins.
recipeInstructions.name: Bake for 30 mins. 5 mins less or more depending on the pan used. Taller cake will need longer time. Check with a toothpick inserted in the middle. It should come out clean. For muffins or cupcakes, bake for 20 to 22 mins.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 5 mins, then remove from the pan and cool completely before frosting. At this point you can optionally brush the cake with a mix of 1 tbsp maple syrup+ 2 tsp water(mix well in a small bowl). This keeps the cake more soft and moist.
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 5 mins, then remove from the pan and cool completely before frosting. At this point you can optionally brush the cake with a mix of 1 tbsp maple syrup+ 2 tsp water(mix well in a small bowl). This keeps the cake more soft and moist.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the ganache: Heat pumpkin puree and milk over medium heat until bubbling hot. Add chocolate, whisk for a few seconds, then take off heat. Continue to whisk until all the chocolate is melted and the mixture is smooth.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the ganache: Heat pumpkin puree and milk over medium heat until bubbling hot. Add chocolate, whisk for a few seconds, then take off heat. Continue to whisk until all the chocolate is melted and the mixture is smooth.

recipeInstructions.text: Cool for 5 mins then chill for 15 mins to thicken. Then then spread over the cake. Add other garnishes such as chopped hazelnuts, coconut or candied pecans. Serve. The frosted cake can be refrigerated for upto 4 days. Frozen for upto a month
recipeInstructions.name: Cool for 5 mins then chill for 15 mins to thicken. Then then spread over the cake. Add other garnishes such as chopped hazelnuts, coconut or candied pecans. Serve. The frosted cake can be refrigerated for upto 4 days. Frozen for upto a month

keywords: easy pumpkin cake recipe, pumpkin cake, pumpkin sheet cake, pumpkin spice cake
